summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1869, for the improvement of North and West 70th Street, in the City of Seattle, from Greenwood Avenue to 8th Avenue Northwest, by constructing concrete sidewalks therein, together with necessary crosswalks and surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 19515 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
